attributes.action: adopt the 'Doctor Who' theme by Murray Gold as the National Anthem.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To keep up with popular culture, the Prime Minister should encourage the Queen to adopt the 'Doctor Who' theme as the National Anthem and 'Love Don't Roam', as used in 'The Runaway Bride', as the secondary anthem.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
